item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, October 11, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Started a guide to writing FUSE filesystems in Python (85 points | 21 comments)

3. Working from home is powering productivity (130 points | 40 comments)

9. Machines of loving grace: How AI could transform the world for the better (40 points | 22 comments)
10. Io_uring and seccomp (2022) (36 points | 6 comments)

15. Hamming AI (YC S24) Is Hiring a Product Engineer ( | hide)

28. Age of Invention: The Coal Conquest (6 points | discuss)
29. Bear is a tool that generates a compilation database for Clang tooling (21 points | 5 comments)
30. AI Winter Is Coming (16 points | 3 comments)
